titleStmt.title: The kings prerogative and the subjects privileges asserted according to law and reason by a person of honour.
Lex terrae
titleStmt.author: Jenkins, David, 1582-1663.
Nalson, John, 1638?-1686.

notesStmt.note: Sometimes attributed to John Nalson, but is actually another edition of Lex terrae, by David Jenkins.
Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
